response.value:
The aim of this report is to introduce the two most popular means of transportation used by students nowadays.With the development of economics,there are more transportations for students to chose.But the research found that bike and train is the most chosen among the youth.

Most popular transport is bike.Why students attend to the bike?The first reason is that cycling is beneficial for environment.Because instead of driving,cycling can reduce carbon emissions.The less carbon emissions means that people will live with less pollution.The second reason is for healthy.If a student go to school by bike every day,the student will be exercised when their muscle works on the cycling.At the same time,cycling can also promote blood circulation.The final reason is the cost,It means the youth can save more money by ridding than driving.Otherwise,there are disadvantages on ridding.It is not enough safe place for bikes.especially on the publics,bikes is easy to be stolen.Besides,the students who choose bikes may late for their classes due to slow ridding.The other one wart is people Need to change clothes after they cycling.
